content: get ready for cuteness because william the whale is swimming right into your life fun fast adorable whale amigurumi is a joy to make it s also a great introduction into amigurumi making so grab your stash yarn and settle in to make this fun whale note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own adorable crochet whale > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hook size g 4 0 mm * safety eyes * fiberfill * tapestry needle and scissors yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn size finished whale body is approximately 1 75 tall from top of head to belly length front to tail fin tip is approximately 4 25 pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-whale/
